meanings.definition: A person who attends or participates in a seminar.
meanings.sent1: The seminarist asked many questions during the workshop.
meanings.sent2: The seminarist took notes diligently during the training session.
meanings.sent3: The seminarist accidentally brought the wrong materials to the conference.
meanings.sent4: She was a seminarist in the art of public speaking.
meanings.sent5: The eager seminarist absorbed every detail of the presentation.

meanings.definition: A student studying for the priesthood.
meanings.sent1: The young seminarist was dedicated to his religious studies.
meanings.sent2: The seminarist spent hours in prayer and reflection each day.
meanings.sent3: The seminarist joked that his favorite subject was 'holy math'.
meanings.sent4: She saw herself as a seminarist of kindness and compassion.
meanings.sent5: The seminarist's faith shone brightly in his actions.
